mapper.insert: insert into business(bu_no, bu_id, bu_pwd, bu_name, bu_address, bu_email, bu_phone) values(seq_bu_no.nextval, #{bu_id}, #{bu_pwd}, #{bu_name}, #{bu_address}, #{bu_email}, #{bu_phone})
mapper.select: select * from business where bu_id=#{bu_id} and bu_pwd=#{bu_pwd}
select bu_id from business where bu_id=#{bu_id}
